## ShaderTechnique interface

Special technique for user-defined shaders. For technique parameters see \[\[ShaderTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShaderTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<ShaderTechniqueParams> 
```
